Key Match Events: Jamal Murray led the way with 21 points and nine assists
Russell Westbrook scored 11 of his 19 in the third quarter
DeAndre Jordan went for 12 points and nine rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets have experience beating the Clippers without Nikola Jokic
The Clippers had a hypothetical tiebreaker clinched. The NBA un-clinched it.
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets remain averse to rest. They are now 8-0 on the second night of back-to-backs but 3-6 after two or more days without a game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers had a hypothetical tiebreaker clinched. The NBA un-clinched it.
Others: The series is 2-2, and if neither team wins its division, a potential tiebreaker will come down to the best record against Western Conference opponents.
